article_title: No Penalties For Late Repayments Of The Premium Tax Credit

article_metadata.author: Tony Nitti

og.description: Last month, I told the tale of the brand spankin' new-for-2014 premium tax credit, or as it's affectionately become known: the credit that YOU pay to the IRS. The premium tax credit is part of the three-pronged insurance reform of Obamacare -- along with the penalty for failure to carry minimum coverage and changes to insurance [...]
